tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids Put 20 or 30, put as many as you want. You wont believe anything people tell you until somebody dies and then it's too late. We have recorded record odour numbers have people who are way more qualified than yourselves. You simply do nothing. !!!

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids When we no longer fear the nightimes, when people no longer need air purifiers, when school children can play in the playgrounds, and we can open our windows, THEN we will feel reassured. Only then.

@richbeanjohnson @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgencyMids Its blowing an Easterly wind straight into the ‚ù§ of Silverdale Village,  the landfill stench is vile along Cemetery road, hundreds of people returning from work greeted with their homes polluted of hydrogen sulphide & this is in the afternoon, what's it going to be like tonight?

2212 complaints about one site in a week. To put that into context, that is more than the @EnvAgencyMids and the wider @EnvAgency would expect to see NATIONALLY, over a MONTH for all the sites and incidents they are responsible for. It is imperative to #stopthestink. https://t.co/A0qDU8lGPQ https://t.co/FsL5xnoo7m
@EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA What will you do about this #environmentalemergency? https://t.co/Fz10SoChFf
Not surprised here at all. Odour is getting worse, not better, by the day.  #stopthestink https://t.co/jwKJEm21wd

@tayz_BETH @DrMickSalt @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @RedIndustries2 @BGFinvestments @NewsNBC @StinkStopthe Read all about it https://t.co/HEH2g0S2hN That growing business that has the most complained about landfill site in the county, impacting health and well being of 1000‚Äôs ...I hope their is some left for the lawsuits... #stopthestink

@Bigdwazda @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency How well are the remedial actions in line with the enforcement notice going? @RedIndustries2 Any comment?Number EA complaints
of odour in the @NewsNBC Newcastle under Lyme area for week from 12 April to 19 April is 2212- is that a weekly record? It‚Äôs out of control #stopthestink

@securedbydesign @DCPoliceRural_D @EnvAgencySW @EnvAgency @BTPDevonCorn @BTPCleland @recyclecats @Opal_SOAC @eyeonmetaltheft @MetalTheftAlert @StopSMECrime Thanks. Clear how it delays as more work and tools needed to clear this before getting the converter itself. Have a good day.

In the barren wilderness of greed and dishonour are beautiful flowers of hope blooming in our community.
